description:
cmd/ld: fix scope of static objects in symbol table

All symbols are currently marked with global scope.
The correct behavior was lost when the symbol table
format was changed.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c479e6a12c69 ***

cmd/ld: fix scope of static objects in symbol table

All symbols are currently marked with global scope.
The correct behavior was lost when the symbol table
format was changed.

R=golang-dev, iant, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/8625043

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

I think this is appropriate for Go 1.1, as it fixes a bug in a recent change.  Please wait for r to confirm that it should go in.

subject: code review 8625043: cmd/ld: fix scope of static objects in symbol table
